sentence.Network_en: Mr Yeltsin spent his early winters in a Urals hut.

sentence.Network_en: That road crosses the Urals and follows the Trans Siberian Railway.

sentence.Network_en: This film is based on a Urals fairytale.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一个关于乌拉山上贪玩小女孩吉哈卡的故事.

means.word_mean: 1. a mountain range in western Russia extending from the arctic to the Caspian Sea; forms part of the traditional boundary between Europe and Asia
